Projects.title: Travel Agency Website
desc: A landing page for a travel agency that I created during my job in a company. The website is built using NextJS, Typescript, and Tailwind CSS. The website has a few features such as a responsive design, a carousel, and a few animations.
The website is designed to be user-friendly and engaging, with a clean and modern interface

Projects.title: Education Website
desc: Landing page of an education website that I created during my internship in a company. The website is built using Reactjs, and Tailwind CSS. The website has a few features such as a responsive design, and a few animations.

Projects.title: Umoult Clone
desc: A project that I cloned to check my frontend skill. The project is a clone of umoult.com, a website full of animations and amazing UI. The website was built using Reactjs, Tailwindcss, and Framer motion.

Projects.title: Typing Game
desc: A simple game that I created using Reactjs and TailwindCSS. The game is a typing game that tests the user's typing speed and accuracy. The game has a few features such as a timer, and a score.

Projects.title: Softball Landing Page
desc: A clone website of a softball landing page that I created using Reactjs and TailwindCSS. The website is a clone of a landing page from dribble. The website has a few features such as a responsive design, and a few animations.

Projects.title: Furniture Website
desc: A website for furniture shopping that I created during my internship in a company. The website is built using Reactjs, and Tailwind CSS. The website has a few features such as a responsive design, a landing page, a product page, and a cart page.

Projects.title: Restaurant App
desc: A restaurant app to showcase the services and meals it provide. It has some features like making reservations and viewing the menu. The app is built using Reactjs and TailwindCSS.

Projects.title: Dashboard App
desc: A nextjs project that I created for practice purpose. The project is a dashboard app that has a few features such as a sidebar, a topbar, and a few pages. The project is built using NextJS, Typescript, and Tailwind CSS.
